extension.name: Jquery Image Scroller Module with Linking
extension.author: Inwebpro Ltd
extension.description: Jquery Image Scroller Module can display images from a specified folder with a navigation bar to scroll through them.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable),this allows individual module styling

field.name: folder
field.label: Image Folder
field.description: Path to the image folder relative to the site url, eg: images/stories

field.name: noofimage
field.label: Images dispaly per row
field.description: how many images dispaly per row

field.name: width
field.label: Width (px)
field.description: Image width (forces all images to be displayed with this width)

field.name: height
field.label: Height (px)
field.description: Image height (forces all images to be displayed with the height)

field.name: modulewidth
field.label: Module Width (px)
field.description: Module width (forces Module width - use with care)

field.name: moduleheight
field.label: Module Height (px)
field.description: Module height (forces Module to be displayed with the height)

field.name: delay
field.label: Rotation Delay
field.description: The image rotation delay in seconds

field.name: theme
field.label: Select Theme
field.description: Select desired theme for module

field.name: mode
field.label: AutoRotate Or No
field.description: Select auto if you want photos to auto rotate

field.name: wind
field.label: Open links
field.description: Open links in parent or new window

field.name: jqlib
field.label: Include Jquery
field.description: Include Jquery library?

field.description: The name of the image on mouse over

field.name: link1
field.label: Link 1
field.description: A URL to redirect to if image is clicked on, eg: http://www.joomla.org
